Description:
Specify the type of information returned in the debug log. Valid values are:
• Db
• Workflow
• Validation
• Callout
• Apex_code
• Apex_profiling
• Visualforce
• System
• All

Specifies the level of detail returned in the debug log.Valid log levels are (listed from lowest to highest):
• NONE
• ERROR
• WARN
• INFO
• DEBUG
• FINE
• FINER
• FINEST
